item.title: Netflix's Daredevil Teaser
item.description: Daredevil heads to the tv screen! And it is bloody! Let's hope it can make us forget all about that bad, bad movie. Yes you know which one I am talking about. You have just removed it from your memory. You can follow the author or shout at him on Twitter
